items.title: Anker’s expanded SOLIX Black Friday Sale increases power station savings up to 70% with new lows starting from $150
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

more…

items.title: We love Anker’s 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand with display and it just hit $150 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its latest 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand for $149.49 shipped. This is one of the newer models Anker debuted a couple of months back for $230, and it’s now seeing its steepest price drop yet. Today’s 35% discount takes $80 off its usual going rate, landing it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. Both Phantom Gray and White variants have hit the $150 low today, and Anker’s online store is matching the price for them today at $150. It’s one of our favorite 25W Qi2 charging stations at the moment, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

items.title: Save up to 55% on Dyson vacuums, purifiers, stylers, more back at lowest prices for Black Friday starting from $250
items.summary:
As part of the Amazon Black Friday Sale, you can now pick up Dyson’s V8 Plus Cordless Stick Vacuum at $279.99 shipped for the first time since 2024, along with a bunch more cleaning devices, beauty devices, and air purifiers. While normally fetching $470 at full price these days, we’ve mostly seen this package keeping between $390 and $350 over the year, with some falls as low as $300, the only two of which happened during both July and October’s Prime Day events. This deal also beats out the one-day-only Target offer on the V8 Origin package, giving you more accessory attachments at the lowest tracked price that hasn’t been seen since Cyber Monday sales in 2024. Head below to get the full rundown on Dyson Black Friday deals while they last.

more…

This is only the first day of Black Friday Week, and as you you will see down below, there are lots of things up for grabs and noteworthy prices. items.title: Amazon early Black Friday Carhartt sale now live: Up to 44% off everyday essentials, winter gear, more
items.summary:
Amazon has kicked off its Carhartt Early Black Friday Sale, offering shoppers up to 44% off a wide range of workwear, everyday apparel, boots, and more. Carhartt, respected for its durable, dependable work gear has seen a major surge in mainstream popularity, evolving from a trusted utility brand into a staple of modern streetwear. Whether you’re stocking up on rugged essentials for demanding jobs or looking to add effortlessly cool pieces to your everyday wardrobe, this sale is a great opportunity to score high-quality Carhartt favorites at some of the best prices of the season.  Shop the entire sale here.

items.title: DJI’s 2,048Wh modular power station hits new $699 Black Friday low ($600+ off) + gimbals, cameras, more from $55
items.summary:
Amazon’s Black Friday Sale event is in full swing, and we’re now seeing the best price yet on DJI’s newer Power 2000 Portable Power Station at $699 shipped, alongside a variety of other devices/accessories from the brand. Carrying an $1,899 MSRP, and more recently a regular price closer to $1,299 on Amazon, the Black Friday savings are bringing things down further than ever, with the discounts we’ve spotted over the year mostly having gone as low as $939, until earlier this month when it fell to $739 for Prime members. Now, you can get it with a 46% markdown from its MSRP, giving you $600 savings to a new all-time low price. Be sure to check out all the other DJI gear we’re seeing benefit from Black Friday savings this year.

Buy for $32 (Reg. $60)

What we love

Nobody likes a dirty car, well, there’s probably someone out there. If that person isn’t you, here’s your chance to keep your ride spotless with Fanttik’s rechargeable vacuum. Since it can be topped off with USB-C, it’ll be easy to refuel when the battery is low using most car chargers.

items.title: Govee’s indoor and outdoor ambient lighting devices hit new lows with up to 50% Black Friday savings from $24
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s ongoing Black Friday Sale event, we’ve spotted a great lineup of deals on Govee smart lighting devices at up to 50% off – including several that will fit right in with your upcoming holiday displays next month and beyond. Among the lineup, we’re seeing the best price yet on Govee’s latest Matter Outdoor Lamp Post for $259.99 shipped. Last month, we saw this newer device fall from its full $430 rate to $300 during Prime Day, keeping down at that price until falling to $280 for the first time at the end of the month. Now, instead of returning costs to that previous low, you can grab it at a new all-time low, courtesy of the 40% markdown from its MSRP that saves you from paying a total $170 that you’d pay should it spike back up. Below, we’ve also curated together a list of the most notable Black Friday Govee deals that we spotted, giving you all you need to upgrade your ambient lighting indoors or outdoors.

items.title: SANDMARC’s only sale of the year now live: Best prices ever on metal/leather iPhone 17 cases, lens attachments, more
items.summary:
Is that time of year again folks. The time of year when the only sale of the year goes live on one of our favorite Apple gear accessory brands – SANDMARC. It is known for a lot of things, including some of the nicest metal and leather iPhone cases (if you’re into that kind of thing, and I’m very much into that kind of thing), and some of best iPhone lens attachments in the game (take it from guy Ben Lovejoy – he’s an absolute pro). But one thing it is not known for is sales…there’s literally only one official sale per year and it is now live when apply code BF2025 at checkout.

We’ve put together a table of content below the fold to help you easily navigate the deals and quickly jump to whatever you may be interested in. We love Spigen accessories here at 9to5Toys, mainly for their solid build quality, reliable durability, and fair pricing, and these Black Friday deals make them even easier on your wallet. items.title: EcoFlow launches next Black Friday Sale phase with up to 80% off expanded lineup – starts from $149
items.summary:
EcoFlow has officially switched to its next Black Friday Sale phase of deals with up to 80% discounts, plenty of FREE gifts, bonus savings, and more. Among the new lineup, we spotted EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Portable Power Station bundled with 2x 220W solar panels and a FREE protective bag at $1,699 shipped, which is not only being exclusively offered direct from the brand, but is also dropping things lower than ever. One thing to note here is that, sadly, the extra savings code isn’t valid on this bundle. It would normally run you $5,199 for everything (including the $99 bag), with the bagless bundle at Amazon keeping lower at a starting rate of $3,999 and only dropping to $1,999 right now. This deal comes in $100 under its previous offer during the brand’s Halloween Sale, giving you a total $2,300 off the going rate ($3,500 off the MSRP) for the best new price that we have tracked anywhere. Be sure to head below to check out the newest phase of full Black Friday deals.
